1316240.name: Titanfall™ 2: Crimson Fury Mastiff
1316240.description: Customized warpaints deck out your favorite weapons! These tailored, weapon-specific warpaints not only drastically change up the look of your weaponry, but grant bonuses to you and your teammates in-game. For each elite weapon warpaint you own, you gain a 10% chance to earn a 2x XP token at the completion of a match (max 30% total).
